programme.desc: The Roughriders face the Lions in the West final. Sean Whyte's field goal as time expired got BC past Calgary 33-30 in the semifinal. Saskatchewan seeks its first Grey Cup berth since 2013, while BC aims for its first trip since hosting in 2011.

programme.title: Live: NFL Countdown
programme.desc: Highlights from previous week's action in the National Football League.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: Lamar Jackson and the Ravens (3-5) visit the rejuvenated Vikings (4-4). Jackson returned from a three-game absence to lead Baltimore to a 28-6 victory at Miami in Week 9 for its second straight win. Minnesota stunned Detroit 27-24 in the Motor City.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Lions look to cash in a receipt against the Commanders. Detroit was upset in the 2024 NFC divisional round 45-31 by Washington. Jayden Daniels (WAS) is out indefinitely after dislocating his left elbow in a prime-time loss to Seattle in Week 9.

programme.title: Live: Football Night in America
programme.desc: "Football Night in America" features host Maria Taylor, Hall of Fame head coach Tony Dungy, former NFL head coach and quarterback Jason Garrett, former NFL quarterback Chris Simms and NFL insider Mike Florio recapping the day's NFL highlights. Co-host Jac Collinsworth and two-time Super Bowl champion Rodney Harrison contribute on-site each week.

programme.title: Live: College Basketball
programme.desc: From the Dean E. Smith Center in Chapel Hill, N.C.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: A battle atop the American Conference sees the Tigers (8-1, 4-1) host the Green Wave (6-2, 3-1). Memphis leads the all-time series 25-15-1 after last season's 34-24 victory. Tulane had its three-game win streak in a 48-26 loss to UTSA on Oct. 30.

programme.title: NBA Basketball
programme.desc: From State Farm Arena in Atlanta.

programme.title: Live: College GameDay
programme.desc: Originating from the site of one of the day's best matchups, with a sea of fans cheering wildly in the background, host Rece Davis and analysts Lee Corso, Kirk Herbstreit and Desmond Howard talk college football for three hours, reporting on the top teams, games, players and storylines. David Pollack and Maria Taylor contribute reports, interviews and features. Davis replaced longtime host Chris F

programme.title: Live: NWSL Soccer
programme.desc: No. 2 Washington hosts No. 7 Louisville for an NWSL quarterfinal tilt. The Spirit picked up a 2-0 win in Kentucky in April before playing Racing Louisville FC to a 2-2 draw at home Aug. 15. Racing went 3-0-2 down the stretch to reach the postseason.

programme.title: Blockers

programme.desc: When a child disappears on his way home from school, Benson and Amaro interview the distraught parents, who don't trust the police; with the help of their TARU tech (Gilbert Gottfried) and a meddling reporter, the detectives narrow the suspects list.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the detectives find a missing 14-year-old working as a prostitute, they set up a sting to put the johns away for statutory rape and find one of her customers is a former professional football player.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After auditioning for a reality show, a woman is found in Central Park unconscious, with drugs in her system and evidence of sexual assault; Detective Benson and Executive ADA Haden (Harry Connick Jr.) continue to grow closer.

programme.desc: Benson and Executive ADA Haden must cut their romantic weekend short to investigate the disappearance of an underage prostitute, who seems to be one in a series of escorts who went missing after advertising on a newspaper's website.

The 118 races to rescue a little girl in a runaway hot air balloon and help with a city power outage caused by a hijacked tree-trimmer truck; Athena's investigation into the serial rapist case puts her life in jeopardy.
The 118 rush to save lives in the aftermath of a massive train derailment.

When the Hollywood Reservoir dam breaks, Bobby and the 118 race into action to save passengers on a city bus that has crashed into a building several stories in the air; the team adjusts to life as first responders during the pandemic.

programme.title: Ant-Man and The Wasp
programme.desc: Scott Lang is grappling with the consequences of his choices as both a superhero and a father. Approached by Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym, Lang must once again don the Ant-Man suit and fight alongside the Wasp. The urgent mission soon leads to secret revelations from the past as the dynamic duo find themselves in an epic battle against a powerful new enemy.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young female Marine goes missing as she is about to give birth to her rapist's child; Olivia struggles with painful flashbacks of her sexual assault.

programme.desc: A man is found badly beaten in a parking lot, with no memory of what happened, and detectives suspect his transgender teen may be responsible.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young couple is found dead in the back of a padlocked truck, detectives discover the male victim was connected to a Mexican drug cartel.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler run into multiple dead ends while investigating the case of a woman who fell to her death wearing only a slip.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After being found unconscious in her hotel bathroom, an Atlanta detective -- in town for a law-enforcement conference -- says that she was raped; Rollins discovers a personal connection to the suspect.

programme.desc: Detectives suspect several young socialites of raping a girl at a Manhattan nightclub, then killing her.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When detective Benson gets into the middle of an investigation of her brother, the case begins to threaten her career.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
